scripts.coverage: browserify demo-app/app.js -p browserify-derequire -t babelify -o demo-app/bundle.unins.js && istanbul instrument demo-app/bundle.unins.js > demo-app/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify demo-app/app.js --debug -t babelify -g [ uglifyify --screw-ie8 --mangle [ --toplevel --eval ] --compress [ --unsafe ] ] | exorcist demo-app/bundle.js.map > demo-app/bundle.js
